exceptions.tactic: intros f g x Hf Hg.
intros f' g x Hf Hg.
intros f' g' x Hf Hg.

exceptions.exn: The reference ex_derive was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hf was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hg was not found in the current environment.
The reference dg was not found in the current environment.
The reference df was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hdf was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The reference Hdg was not found in the current environment.

original: intros f g x Hf Hg. unfold ex_derive in *. destruct Hf as [df Hdf]. destruct Hg as [dg Hdg]. exists (plus df dg). apply is_derive_plus with (df := df) (dg := dg). - apply Hdf. - apply Hdg.
